column8: Beraur's light leads the way to the end of the tunnel, the path back to forgiveness and civilization. The Cleansing Light seeks to bring order to chaos and purity to corruption. His followers are occasionally accused of overzealousness when they burn away the rot.
column10: seek out and challenge oppressors and tyrants, defend friends and the innocent
column11: suffer a bully's insults to you or another without retort, abandon a friend in need

column8: Cinderbeard murdered Lathas to join the Hucaen pantheon. The Haunted Doom helps those who help themselves, by whatever means necessary. His worship is led in secret by the most ambitious and unscrupulous in society.
column10: change the world, act with ambition or not at all, keep your plans secret
column11: deny your appetites, seek the approval of society, betray those in the church above you
column13: 1st: draw ire, 3rd: curse of lost time, 4th: channel arrogance

column8: Duella watches over the people of Hucaen as they sleep and dream. The Dream Dweller is not to be trifled with, however - she can just as easily give nightmares as peaceful sleep. Some say the stars in the sky are individual dreams.
column10: always make time for sleeping and dreams, ensure others never go to sleep scared
column11: stay up all night without any breaks for sleeping or dreaming, attack a person or creature while they sleep

column8: Ghadea presides over any artful creation, from grand symphonies and towering statues to fashionable clothes and delicate jewelry. The Cosmic Artist is invoked in the construction of many things, from a simple horseshoe to the factories and towers of Smackels-on-the-River.
column10: choose and perfect an art, lead by example, respect the forge
column11: destroy art or allow it to be destroyed, unless saving a life or pursuing greater art; intentionally create inferior works,

column8: Grianke embodies balance, truth, and justice. The Eternal Judge wants to root out corruption and injustice everywhere. His followers accomplish this by direct action or exposing it for the public to take action.
column10: be humble; help others perfect themselves; hone your body, mind, and spirit to a more perfect state
column11: become addicted to a substance, refuse a challenge from an equal, repeatedly fail to maintain self-control

column8: Jevitras searches for new knowledge and new magic relentlessly. The Keen Librarian has directed their followers to build libraries and laboratories instead of temples. They prefer if people don't get hurt in the process, but only so much.
column10: seek out magical power and use it
column11: pursue mundane paths over magical ones

column8: Qhontia presides over the cycle of death and birth, from death in combat and old age, to reincarnation, all the way on down to compost. They make sure the cycle continues - things must die to make room for things to be born.
column10: recycle rot and waste into useful creations, shock the self-righteous, destroy undead
column11: waste food or good materials, allow rot to poison an area, create undead
column13: 1st: pest form, 2nd: one with plants, 7th: execute

column8: Renza fiercely protects those she loves, and those in need. The Blood Risen is strong emotion and adrenaline personified: She loves the thrill of combat, of love, of righteous fury.
column10: do whatever it takes to survive
column11: allow others to slight you without retaliation, forgive those who have wronged you, sacrifice others in your place
column13: 1st: pummeling rubble, 2nd: blood vendetta, 3rd: vampiric feast

column8: Solous enjoys all things that sow discord - friends falling out over a misunderstanding, a mark falling hard for a particularly nasty con, and anything that undermines authority. The Savage Wild will happily bring down a town or even a city towards this end.
column10: embarrass and expose hypocrites, humble those in power, play pranks and practical jokes
column11: show remorse for your pranks, take a joke personally

column8: Taszia ushers the dead to a peaceful rest, and abhors anything that interferes, especially the undead. The Tears Wept mourn for those who have died, and those he knows will die. He is cursed with the knowledge of the future, and shares in the form of prophecy.
column10: lay bodies to rest, aid fellow travelers, explore new places
column11: make decisions erratically or randomly, desecrate a corpse, rob a tomb, engage in banditry or piracy

column8: Taveyar believes that might makes right. The Dread Archduke has fans in all levels of many heirarchies, particularly military ones. His preferred method of worship is via combat, and he is not known for mercy.
column10: veil your motives, make dangerous deals, speak with refinement
column11: cower from fights, neglect your defenses, betray a lover
column13: 1st: hydraulic push, 4th: vision of death, 9th: massacre
